title: Revving for Love
description: TWISTING THE THROTTLE AND REVVING FOR LOVE.Ten amazing authors that bring you MC Valentine's stories of couples that you already know and love.Ten feared men, that would fight through hell to protect their women. They are rough and coarse but their heart is true, and now Valentine's is approaching, how do these bikers celebrate a day dedicated to love?
author: Alexi Ferreira
